name: Lip Type - Botox-Enhanced
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Botox-enhanced lips, smooth and plump, well-defined edges, slightly firm appearance, fuller volume

name: Lip Type - Bow-Shaped
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Bow-shaped lips, well-defined cupid’s bow shaped lips, soft curves, symmetrical, delicate outline

name: Lip Type - Broad
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Broad lips, wide, fuller width across the face, balanced proportions

name: Lip Type - Classic
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Classic lips, balanced shape, medium fullness, elegant and proportional

name: Lip Type - Downturned
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Downturned lips, subtle corners facing downward, gentle arch, graceful and soft expression

name: Lip Type - Filler-Injected
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Filler-injected lips, high volume, sculpted curves, pronounced fullness, soft and plump

name: Lip Type - Full
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Full lips, plump, rounded, noticeable volume, balanced proportions, soft appearance

name: Lip Type - Heart-Shaped
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Heart-shaped lips, distinct cupid’s bow, fuller lower lip, narrow upper edges

name: Lip Type - Heavy Lower Lip
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Heavy lower lip, fuller lower lip, gentle upper curve, defined lower contour, pouty appearance

name: Lip Type - Overfilled
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Overfilled lips, exaggerated fullness, smooth surface, pronounced pout, bold and prominent

name: Lip Type - Puffy
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Puffy lips, naturally full, soft contours, rounded and plump, noticeable volume and gentle texture

name: Lip Type - Round
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Round lips, curved upper and lower lips, soft circular shape, gentle, natural volume

name: Lip Type - Sculpted Full
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Sculpted full lips, enhanced shape, refined contours, rich volume, well-defined

name: Lip Type - Sharp Cupid’s Bow
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Sharp cupid’s bow, prominent V-shape, well-defined peaks, sharp upper lip contours

name: Lip Type - Subtle Enhancement
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Subtle enhancement lips, gentle fullness, natural-looking volume, balanced and refined contours

name: Lip Type - Thin
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Thin lips, subtle volume, delicate shape, narrow and refined, classic and understated

name: Lip Type - Wide
positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Wide lips, extended horizontally, balanced fullness, expressive
